sentences.sentence: Warty recurrences occurred in the perineal wound within a month of surgery.
sentences.translation: 局部切除术后一个月内伤口疣体复发。

sentences.sentence: Results: Postoperative and follow-up results demonstrated no one case of hircismus relapse once more with the perineal scars.
sentences.translation: 结果：术后及随访结果表明无一例腋臭再次复发和瘢痕挛缩形成。
